title: Record-setting cold for Super Bowl
text:
Record-setting cold for Super Bowl Sunday, February 04, 2018 - 01:11 
Philadelphia Eagles fans will be shivering from both cold and anticipation as their team vies to win its first Super Bowl title, as record-setting cold grips the host city. Diane Hodges reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Philadelphia Eagles fans will be shivering from both cold and anticipation as their team vies to win its first Super Bowl title, as record-setting cold grips the host city. Diane Hodges reports.
